snippet.title: The Sin Collector: Repentless - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
✅ Link to the game 👉 https://bit.ly/3H8hRyq

THE SIN COLLECTOR: REPENTLESS is a game on the border of a visual novel and a classic text RPG, set in the world of The Sin Collector, a series of books written by Michał Gołkowski. Action takes place a couple of years before the events presented in the books. BECOME Aniketos – a Sin Collector serving Them At The Top, striving to clear up the remains of our world of sinners and bring the half-baked Apocalypse to an (un)happy conclusion.

Follow us on:
Web: 👉  https://bit.ly/3rpVmMh
Twitch: 👉  https://bit.ly/3vVI6CJ
Twitter: 👉  https://bit.ly/3fdOUFK
Facebook: 👉  https://bit.ly/2NWKVCw
